text: Atahpara amara kacha theke yakhana tadera kache satya agamana karala, takhana tara balala, musake yerupa deya hayechila, e'i rasulake serupa deya hala na kena? Purbe musake ya deya hayechila, tara ki ta asbikara kareni? Tara balechila, ubhaya'i jadu, paraspare ekatma. Tara ara'o balechila, amara ubhayake mani na.
